product_name: Lezyne Super Drive XL Front Bike Light
long_description: Sleek, compact and durable thanks to its machined aluminum body, the Lezyne Super Drive XL Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 575 lumens for good visibility in the dark. A single high-performance LED emits a 575-lumen beam that runs for 1.5 hrs. on high and 12 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. A specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting. Power Indicator button lets you check the power level any time. The Lezyne Super Drive XL Front Bike Light includes a Lezyne wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
short_description: Sleek, compact and durable thanks to its machined aluminum body, the Lezyne Super Drive XL Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 575 lumens for good visibility in the dark.
